author: Cody Doremus

changelog.release_notes: Added repeat on the increment and decrement buttons. Every 120 ms you will get a new count if you hold the button down. You should still reliably get just 1 increment if you press and release.

Initial release. Count up to 4 numbers. App remembers the last state. Switch between 1, 10, 100, and 1000 increment / decrement options. Hold the select button when modifying a number to 0 it out.

Short long short vibration and icon on a bluetooth disconnect.

description:
People are bad at remembering numbers. Pebble is good at always being on and displaying numbers. Use this app to count and remember up to 4 numbers at a time. Don't worry about leaving to do something else with your watch, it will remember where you left off the next time you return.

Use the right buttons to select which number to modify. Once you are modifying a number press the select button to switch between counting by 1, 10, 100, or 1000. If you count high enough (or low enough) your number may run off the screen.

Hold down the increment button or decrement button to count really fast or press and release to get a single count.

Hold down the select button to reset the count to 0.

Press the back button to return to selecting your number.

Like all my apps I don't want you to loose your phone so you will get a short long short vibration if your bluetooth is disconnected. An icon will show in the top left corner.

Heart MultiCounter if you like it and check out Timeline and my Precisioneer watchfaces. I appreciate the hearts on those too!

Counter

latest_release.release_notes: Added repeat on the increment and decrement buttons. Every 120 ms you will get a new count if you hold the button down. You should still reliably get just 1 increment if you press and release.

title: MultiCounter
